translation.Message_0_Page_0: Pleased to meet you <name_char>. You're welcome aboard, just keep in mind you're back in society so don't try and pull anything illegal.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: We're part of an international force formed in the wake of the outbreak called the <color=legendary>Coalition</color>. Our mission here is to rescue as many survivors, like you, as possible and unite to reclaim our home.
